puavo.desktop.background.description: The default desktop backgronud image path (absolute path or something under /usr/share/backgrounds)

puavo.desktop.dconf.settings.description: A list of locked dconf setttings, separate with "|" and set with key=value

puavo.desktop.environment.description: Set an environment variable with KEY=VALUE for desktop sessions

puavo.desktop.keyboard.layout.description: A comma-separated list of keyboard layouts to support on desktop

puavo.desktop.keyboard.variant.description: A comma-separated list of keyboard layouts variants to support on desktop, to be used matching with puavo.desktop.keyboard.layout setting
